applicant-information.form-instructions: If you notice an error or need to update the name, date of birth or Social Insurance Number (SIN), contact Service Canada by calling 1-833-537-4342.

government-dental-benefits.have-access: Access to other government dental benefits
government-dental-benefits.update-link-text: Change access to other government dental benefits

edit-dental-benefits.title: {{applicantName}}'s access to other federal, provincial or territorial dental benefits
edit-dental-benefits.access-to-dental: Access to dental coverage through a provincial, territorial or federal government social program will not impact your eligibility for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
edit-dental-benefits.eligibility-criteria: If you meet all the eligibility criteria, your coverage will be coordinated between the plans to ensure there are no gaps or duplication in coverage.

federal-benefits.title: Federal benefits
federal-benefits.legend: Do you have other dental benefits through a federal social program other than the Canadian Dental Care Plan?
federal-benefits.option-no: No, I do not have federal dental benefits

social-programs.legend: Please select which social program you are covered under. If you have more than one, please select the one you use most.

provincial-territorial-benefits.title: Provincial or territorial benefits
provincial-territorial-benefits.legend: Do you have other dental benefits through a provincial or territorial social program other than the Canadian Dental Care Plan?
provincial-territorial-benefits.option-yes: Yes, I have provincial or territorial dental benefits
provincial-territorial-benefits.option-no: No, I do not have provincial or territorial dental benefits

social-programs.input-legend: If yes, through which province or territory?
social-programs.radio-legend: Please select which social program you are covered under. If you have more than one, please select the one you use most.

error-message.federal-benefit-program-required: Select which federal program you are covered under
error-message.federal-benefit-required: Select whether you have federal dental benefits
error-message.provincial-benefit-program-required: Select which provincial or territorial program you are covered under
error-message.provincial-benefit-required: Select whether you have provincial or territorial dental benefits

edit-child-dental-benefits.title: {{childName}}: access to other federal, provincial or territorial dental benefits
edit-child-dental-benefits.access-to-dental: Access to dental coverage through a provincial, territorial or federal government social program will not impact the child's eligibility for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
edit-child-dental-benefits.eligibility-criteria: If the child meets all the eligibility criteria, their coverage will be coordinated between the plans to ensure there are no gaps or duplication in coverage.

federal-benefits.title: Federal benefits
federal-benefits.legend: Does {{childName}} have other dental benefits through a federal social program other than the Canadian Dental Care Plan?
federal-benefits.option-no: No, this child does not have federal dental benefits

social-programs.legend: Please select which social program this child is covered under. If this child has more than one, please select the one you use most.

provincial-territorial-benefits.title: Provincial or territorial benefits
provincial-territorial-benefits.legend: Does {{childName}} have other dental benefits through a provincial or territorial social program other than the Canadian Dental Care Plan?
provincial-territorial-benefits.option-yes: Yes, this child has provincial or territorial dental benefits
provincial-territorial-benefits.option-no: No, this child does not have provincial or territorial dental benefits

social-programs.input-legend: If yes, through which province or territory?
social-programs.radio-legend: Please select which social program this child is covered under. If this child has more than one, please select the one you use most.

error-message.federal-benefit-program-required: Select which federal program the child is covered under
error-message.federal-benefit-required: Select whether the child has federal dental benefits
error-message.provincial-benefit-program-required: Select which provincial or territorial program the child is covered under
error-message.provincial-benefit-required: Select whether the child has provincial or territorial dental benefits

communication-preferences.online: Online through My Service Canada Account

edit-communication-preferences.preferred-method: How would you like Sun Life to communicate with you?
edit-communication-preferences.preferred-language: What is your preferred official language of communication?
edit-communication-preferences.preferred-notification-method: How would you like to receive updates from the Government of Canada about the Canadian Dental Care Plan?
edit-communication-preferences.preferred-notification-method-msca:
Online through My Service Canada Account (MSCA)
Signing up online is the fastest way to receive updates.
edit-communication-preferences.preferred-notification-method-mail:
By mail
You can also view your Canadian Dental Care Plan information in MSCA.

error-message.preferred-method-required: Select preferred method of communication for Sun Life
error-message.preferred-notification-method-required: Select preferred method of communication for the Government of Canada
error-message.preferred-method-email-verified: A verified email address is required to receive communications from Sun Life digitally.
error-message.preferred-notification-method-email-veri: A verified email address is required to receive communications from the Government of Canada digitally.

phone-number.help-message: Adding your phone number helps us reach you quickly if there's a problem with your application. If you don't give a number, we'll contact you by mail.

error-message.phone-number-valid-international: Phone number does not exist. If it's an international phone number, add '+' in front
error-message.phone-number-alt-valid-international: Phone number does not exist. If it's an international phone number, add '+' in front

email.provide-email: Provide the email address you'd like the Government of Canada and/or Sun Life to use to contact you about your Canadian Dental Care Plan coverage.
email.verify-email: We will need to verify your email address.

error-message.email-required: Enter email address, for example name@example.com
error-message.email-valid: Enter an email address in the correct format, such as name@example.com

verify-email.verification-code: An email with a verification code has been sent to {{email}}. Please enter the 5-digit verification code and select "Continue".
verify-email.request-new: It may take up to 60 seconds for the email to arrive. If you don't see it, check your junk or spam folder. If you still don't have the code, you can request a new one.
verify-email.unable-to-verify: If you are not able to verify your email, select “Back” to update the email address  or <communicationLink>modify your communication preference</communicationLink>.

error-message.verification-code-max-attempts: You have entered an incorrect verification code more than 5 times. You must request a new code using the "Request new verification code" link below.

verification-code-alert.heading: The verification code entered does not match the code that was sent to the email address provided, or the code has expired.
verification-code-alert.detail: Please check the code and try again. If the issue continues, you can request a new code using the "Request new verification code" link below.

code-sent.heading: New verification code
code-sent.detail: A new verification code has been sent to {{email}}.

mailing-address.address-help: Include apartment number (if applicable), street number, street name. For example: 123 Main St. Suite 4B
mailing-address.use-mailing-address: My mailing address is the same as my home address
